sense.def:
A custom
je dejavnost, povezana s starimi šegami ali praznovanjem.

seg.quote: My wife likes all the old English customs.

sense.def:
Če je nekaj
the custom
, tisto navadno počnemo v določenih okoliščinah.

seg.quote: It is the custom to take chocolates or fruit when visiting a patient in hospital.
It is Howard's custom to take his class for coffee afterwards.

sense.def:
Customs
je kraj, kjer morajo ljudje, ki pripotujejo iz tuje države, prijaviti blago, ki ga prinašajo s seboj.

seg.quote: At Kennedy airport I went through the customs.
Many local services depend on the University's custom.
